actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service, S. Rept. 93-407.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution disapproving the alternate plan for pay adjustments for Federal employees.

summary.text: Declares that the Senate disapproves the alternative plan for pay adjustments for Federal employees under statutory pay systems recommended and submitted by the President to Congress on August 31, 1973.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the alternate plan for pay adjustments for Federal employees.
